title: Countries and regions
description: Our World In Data countries and geo-regions harmonisation dataset. Contains various identifiers for all current sovereign nations, overseas territories, some historic countries as well as common groupings like continents like world

dataset.description:
Our World In Data reference datasets. These datasets define the vocabulary for important dimensions that we harmonized across different datasets. 
Every table represents the vocabulary for one dimensions and can include additional columns like third party identifiers, hierarchical grouping etc.

code.title: OWID geo code
code.description: The primary identifier for geographic entities at Our World In Data. Based on ISO alpha 3 country codes but extended with custom identifiers where necessary.

name.title: Name
name.description: The preferred name for a country/region

cow_letter.title: Correlates of War country code
cow_letter.description: Correlates of War project country code (StateAbb)

cow_code.title: Correlates of War country id
cow_code.description: Correlates of War project country identifier (CCode)

unctad_code.title: UN CTAD code
unctad_code.description: United Nations Conference on Trade and Development country code

marc_code.title: MARC code
marc_code.description: Library of Congress MARC project country code

penn_code.title: PENN world table country code
penn_code.description: Country code for the PENN World Talbe project by the University of Groningen

wikidata_uri.title: Wikidata id
wikidata_uri.description: The Wikidata identifier for this country/region

legacy_entity_id.title: Legacy OWID entity table id
legacy_entity_id.description: Used for matching legacy data that contained ids from the Our World In Data mysql entity table

legacy_country_id.title: Legacy OWID country table id
legacy_country_id.description: Used for matching legacy data that contained ids from the Our World In Data mysql country_name_tool_countrydata table

members.title: List of members of each region/country
members.description: An optional json encoded array of strings referencing other rows in this table by 'code'. Rows that have entries here are understood to 'contain' other entries, e.g. continents list the contained countries or a country could list the contained subnational regions.

aliases.title: List of aliases for this country/region
aliases.description: An optional json encoded array of alternative names for the country/region.
